# ACT-R Chunk


- id
- Attribute
	- Attributes point to other chunks (eg: fact3+2)
	- number of attributes
- Activation
	- determines priority of retrieval
	- if below threshold, chunk cannot be retrieved
	- determines time of retrieval
	- decays with time
	- depends on
		- How often retrieved or recreated
		- context
